value.string:
<tal:block replace="nothing"
 xmlns:tal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal"
 xmlns:metal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal"
 xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n"/>
 
 <tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/>
 
 /*========================================================================================
 WebSite_viewWorkspaceWidgets CSS.
 
 ========================================================================================*/
 
 
 .widget_space{
 min-width: 400px;
 margin-left:25% !important;
 margin-right:25% !important;
 /*padding: 0px !important;*/
 }
 
 
 .widget_space div.field{
 clear:none !important;
 min-width:185px;
 width:47%;
 /*height:200px;*/
 }
 
 .widget_space .pending_requests{
 /*margin-right:6% !important;*/
 float:left;
 }
 
 .widget_space .my_documents{
 float:right;
 }
 
 .widget_space .pending_requests,
 .widget_space .my_documents{
 border:1px solid #AAA;
 background:white;
 }
 
 .widget_space .input{
 margin:0 !important;
 padding:1em;
 }
